hero.title: Building a Better N.18 Inanam, Together
hero.description: The official platform for residents to report local issues and drive community-led solutions. Your voice matters, and together we can make a difference.

howItWorks.title: Simple Steps to Make a Difference
howItWorks.subtitle: Getting started is easy. Follow these three simple steps to contribute to your community.

step1.title: Spot & Report
step1.description: Easily submit a detailed report about any issue you encounter in the community. Add photos, location, and description to help authorities understand the problem.

step2.title: Community & Authority Review
step2.description: Your report is reviewed by community moderators and relevant local authorities. They assess the issue and determine the best course of action.

step3.title: Track Progress & Resolution
step3.description: Follow the status of your report from submission to final resolution. Get real-time updates and see how your report contributes to making N.18 Inanam better.

statistics.title: Community Impact
statistics.subtitle: See how our community is making a difference together

features.title: Your Voice, Our Community
features.subtitle: Powerful features designed to make community engagement simple and effective

transparentTracking.title: Transparent Tracking
transparentTracking.description: Monitor the progress of every report from submission to resolution in real-time. Stay informed about what's happening in your community.

directCommunication.title: Direct Communication
directCommunication.description: Engage with local authorities and neighbors to work together on solutions. Build stronger connections within your community.

collectiveProblemSolving.title: Collective Problem-Solving
collectiveProblemSolving.description: Be part of a community that actively contributes to making N.18 Inanam better. Together, we can achieve more than we ever could alone.

cta.title: Ready to Make an Impact?
cta.description: Join your neighbors in building a stronger community. Report an issue or register to stay informed about what's happening in N.18 Inanam.

footer.description: The official platform for residents to report local issues and drive community-led solutions in N.18 Inanam.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: N.18 Inanam Community Platform

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe in empowering communities to take action. Our platform connects residents with local authorities, making it easy to report issues, track progress, and work together to build a better N.18 Inanam.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.issueReporting: Issue Reporting: Simple, accessible way to report community issues
whatWeDo.transparency: Transparency: Real-time tracking of issue status and resolution
whatWeDo.communityEngagement: Community Engagement: Connect neighbors and local authorities
whatWeDo.accountability: Accountability: Ensure issues are addressed and resolved

values.title: Our Values
values.transparency: Transparency: We believe in open communication and clear processes.
values.communityFirst: Community First: Every feature is designed with the community's needs in mind.
values.actionOriented: Action-Oriented: We focus on results and real-world impact.
values.collaboration: Collaboration: We bring together residents, authorities, and stakeholders.

about.joinUs: Join us in building a stronger, more connected N.18 Inanam community.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in Touch
contact.description: We're here to help! Reach out to us through any of the following channels.

careline.title: CARELINE
careline.description: For urgent matters and general inquiries, contact our CARELINE.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp
whatsapp.description: Connect with us on WhatsApp for quick responses and support.

contact.feedback: We value your feedback and are committed to improving our services.

viewReports.title: View Reports
viewReports.subtitle: Community Issue Reports
viewReports.description: Stay informed about issues reported in your community. Browse through active reports, see their status, and track their progress.

categories.title: Report Categories
categories.environment: Environment: Waste management, pollution, green spaces

status.title: Report Status
status.open: Open: Newly reported issues awaiting review
status.underReview: Under Review: Issues being assessed by authorities
status.inProgress: In Progress: Active work being done to resolve the issue
status.resolved: Resolved: Issues that have been successfully addressed
status.closed: Closed: Issues that have been completed or are no longer relevant

viewReports.browseReports: Browse reports to see what's happening in your community and how you can help.
